channel.title: Always have the special attack bar full?
channel.description: title says it, i was just wondering where you can go to change the special attack bar to be full all the time, and not deplete, thanks.

item.title: Always have the special attack bar full?
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

str2own99:

ok this is how to do it with out commands go to characters click on ur name then scroll down it should say special ammount or so change it to 99999999

okay thank you

Read full topic
item.source: Always have the special attack bar full?

item.title: Always have the special attack bar full?
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“jeddac, post:10, topic:357355”]even though you already have it…
just make a command so everytime the player logs in it adds +99999999999 etc spec?[/quote]

good idea, but i found i did have a command, i just want it all the time like what im going to say below.

recker450:

or make it always full every second…without commands

how would i add this? or is there a spot im supposed to modify? and also, can you make it so you set player rights to 3 also for owners?

Read full topic

item.source: Always have the special attack bar full?

item.title: Always have the special attack bar full?
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“ameer122, post:8, topic:357355”]here the help :d

if(command.startsWith("@@@@") && playerRights => 0) { specialAmount += $$$$; specAttack(); }

@@@@ = commands name
$$$$ = amount special to all one[/quote]

already have it, thanks though.

Read full topic
item.source: Always have the special attack bar full?

item.title: Always have the special attack bar full?
item.dc:creator: @ameer122 ameer122
item.description:
@ameer122 wrote:

here the help :d

if(command.startsWith("@@@@") && playerRights => 0) { specialAmount += $$$$; specAttack(); }

@@@@ = commands name
$$$$ = amount special to all one

Read full topic
item.source: Always have the special attack bar full?

item.title: Always have the special attack bar full?
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:4, topic:357355”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“fullspec”)) {
specialAmount = 500000;
}[/quote]

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:5, topic:357355”]Just look for where the specialAmount is subtracted by an amount.

specialAmount =- 25

Something like that, and change it to zero, or just remove all the lines.[/quote]

[quote=“recker450, post:6, topic:357355”]maybe go to void process?
i know itll lagg but maybe a little?

and add something like this

if(specialAmount < 100) {
specialAmount = 100;
}

not sure but give it a try[/quote]

you guys are so much help thanks everyone!

Read full topic
item.source: Always have the special attack bar full?

item.title: Always have the special attack bar full?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

maybe go to void process?
i know itll lagg but maybe a little?

and add something like this

if(specialAmount < 100) {
specialAmount = 100;
}

not sure but give it a try

Read full topic

item.title: Always have the special attack bar full?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Just look for where the specialAmount is subtracted by an amount.

specialAmount =- 25

Something like that, and change it to zero, or just remove all the lines.

Read full topic
